com.carnival.sdk

Class MessageActivity

  • com.carnival.sdk.MessageActivity

  • public class MessageActivity

    Activity to display the detail content of a class Message.

    See Also:
    class Message

    • Method Detail

      • intentForMessage

        @NonNull
public static android.content.Intent intentForMessage(@NonNull
                                                               android.content.Context context,
                                                               @Nullable
                                                               android.os.Bundle bundle,
                                                               @NonNull
                                                               Message message)

        Creates an Intent for correctly displaying a Carnival Message Activity.

        Parameters:
        context - The Application Context.
        bundle - Any bundled extras to add to the Intent.
        message - The Message to display in MessageActivity.
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@732c336: An Intent to launch the MessageActivity with a specific Message.

      • intentForMessage

        Creates an Intent for correctly displaying a Carnival Message Activity.

        Parameters:
        context - The Application Context.
        bundle - Any bundled extras to add to the Intent.
        messageId - The Id of the Message to display in MessageActivity.
